headline: Did Duke Energy’s (DUK) Leadership Change and Earnings Beat Signal a Shift in Long-term Priorities?
summary: Duke Energy Corporation recently reported third quarter earnings, with revenue rising to US$8.54 billion and net income increasing to US$1.42 billion compared to a year earlier, while also announcing that Katie Aittola will become senior vice president of supply chain and real estate effective January 1, succeeding retiring executive Dwight Jacobs. Katie Aittola’s background in finance, risk, and strategic transformation is expected to help guide the company’s operational and real estate...
